author: rahul
msg: Static code review tools pointed out serialization defect. It is anticipated that better solution(s) will exist in the next version of Commons SCXML (see SCXML-20 on the main ASF JIRA instance, for example), but for now, we re-parse the state machine and set it uo to start in the last known (dialog) state.

author: sichen
msg: Fix issues with open order item report and 'Required for SO' value in orderview.  Introduced a new view-entity to report quantities ordered, issued and open gropued by order item.  Renamed the view entity grouped by product to be consistent.  Simplified the report bsh and InventoryWorker methods.  These fixes are dependent on a the <complex-alias> COALESCE issue OFBIZ-336.

author: olegk
msg: [HTTPCORE-14] Consider decoupling HttpHost and Scheme and moving Scheme, SocketFactory and SecureSocketFactory to HttpConn
* HttpHost is no longer coupled with the Scheme class

author: mriou
msg: Support for relative urls on imports.
